summary: The module provides mixin classes that augment automatic speech recognition models with subword tokenization support, dynamic reconfiguration of internal components (such as attention layers, convolutional context windows, subsampling factors, and streaming steps), and utilities for speaker diarization, handling tokenizer initialization, cleanup, and safe interaction with optional sub-modules.
business_intent: Enable flexible and modular development of NeMo ASR systems by allowing easy integration of tokenizers, runtime adjustment of model architecture, and incorporation of diarization functionality, thereby accelerating speech technology product development.
